title.rendered: How to Watch NFR 2023 in the UK

content.rendered:
Summary

  • Schedule of the 2023 NFR
  • How to Watch National Finals Rodeo in the UK
    • Step 1 – Finding TV Coverage in the UK
    • Step 2 – Using VPNs to Watch NFR Online
    • Step 3 – NFR Streaming Options
    •  Step 4 – Social Media Broadcasting
  • Conclusion

You can watch NFR in the UK through Sky TV, BBC, and streaming channels like (Sling TV, DirecTV, etc.). The National Finals Rodeo (NFR) is an annual event that brings together the top rodeo competitors in the United States.

It is a highly anticipated event, with thousands of fans worldwide tuning in to watch the thrilling competition.

However, for viewers in the UK, watching NFR can be challenging due to geographical restrictions and broadcasting limitations.

While it may be difficult to watch the NFR live if you’re not in the United States, there are still ways to catch all the action.

You can find live updates and highlights online or on television channels that offer rodeo events coverage.

So, you want to watch the NFR in the UK? Here’s everything you need to know, from live streaming options and VPN services to the event schedule.

Whether you’re a die-hard rodeo fan or just looking to catch the action, this guide will help you prepare and plan for an enjoyable viewing experience.

Schedule of the 2023 NFR

Before we explore the options to tune into NFR in the UK, we must grasp the event schedule. Spanning ten days, every day showcases a different type of competition, such as bareback riding, steer wrestling, team roping, saddle bronc riding, tie-down roping, barrel racing, and bull riding.

The 2023 National Finals Rodeo (NFR) is scheduled to take place from December 7 to 16 at the Thomas & Mack Center in Las Vegas. Each performance starts at 5:45 p.m. Here is the schedule for each day:

  • Thursday, December 7: First Performance (Performance Sponsor: Pendleton Whisky)
  • Friday, December 8: Second Performance (Performance Sponsor: Coors)
  • Saturday, December 9: Third Performance (Performance Sponsor: Hesston by Massey Ferguson)
  • Sunday, December 10: Fourth Performance — Memorial Night (Performance Sponsor: Polaris Ranger)
  • Monday, December 11: Fifth Performance — Tough Enough to Wear Pink Night (Performance Sponsor: Montana Silversmiths)
  • Tuesday, December 12: Sixth Performance — Resistol Rookie Night (Performance Sponsor: Resistol)
  • Wednesday, December 13: Seventh Performance — Military Night (Performance Sponsor: Not specified in the search results)
  • Thursday, December 14: Eighth Performance (Performance Sponsor: Not specified in the search results)
  • Friday, December 15: Ninth Performance (Performance Sponsor: Not specified in the search results)
  • Saturday, December 16: Tenth Performance (Performance Sponsor: Not specified in the search results)

How to Watch National Finals Rodeo in the UK

Here is the step-by-step guide for watching NFR in the UK.

Step 1 – Finding TV Coverage in the UK

A few options are available for those wishing to watch the NFR in the UK. Sky TV’s Western Channel is one of the more popular choices, offering rodeo programming and coverage of the NFR.

Otherwise, highlights may be available through Eurosport after the event has concluded.

Another way is to look for it on the BBC website. Also, you can look for it on a rodeo website. Another way is to look for it on a website specializing in UK TV coverage. Another way is to look for it on a website specializing in rodeo coverage.

Whichever way you choose, check the website for updated information on when and where the National Finals Rodeo will be televised.

Step 2 – Using VPNs to Watch NFR Online

If you don’t have a cable or satellite TV subscription, you can still watch National Finals Rodeo 2023 online using a VPN. A VPN, or Virtual Private Network, allows you to connect to the internet through a secure, encrypted connection.

Your internet traffic is private and cannot be monitored or tracked by your ISP or government.

Many streaming services, like CBS All Access, provide coverage of the NFR – but only for certain regions. With a VPN, viewers in the UK can access these services just as if they were in the US.

There are many VPN providers to choose from, but we recommend ExpressVPN. ExpressVPN has a fast, reliable connection and offers a money-back guarantee if you’re unsatisfied.

To use ExpressVPN, sign up for a plan, download the app, and connect to a server in the United States.

Once connected, you can stream the event live on the National Finals Rodeo website.

Step 3 – NFR Streaming Options

There are several options for live streaming the National Finals Rodeo in the UK. Among the most viable options are the following:

  • CBS Sports Network: CBS Sports Network is the official broadcaster of the National Finals Rodeo in the United States. It offers live coverage of all ten event rounds and pre-show and post-show coverage. As CBS Sports Network is only available in the US, UK viewers must use a VPN (a virtual private network) to watch it.
  • ProRodeoTV: ProRodeoTV is the official streaming service of the Professional Rodeo Cowboys Association (PRCA). It annually offers live coverage of the National Finals Rodeo and other PRCA events. ProRodeoTV is available globally, and viewers in the UK can access it without needing a VPN.
  • Cowboy Channel+: A streaming service like Cowboy Channel Plus provides live coverage of the National Finals Rodeo and other rodeo events and western lifestyle programming. Viewers in the UK must use a VPN to access Cowboy Channel Plus, which is available globally.

So, If you’re a rodeo fan in the UK, you’re in luck. ProRodeoTV and Cowboy Channel Plus offer live coverage of the National Finals Rodeo, so you don’t need a VPN. If you prefer CBS Sports Network, you can use a VPN to access it.

 Step 4 – Social Media Broadcasting

One of the most simple ways is to follow the event on social media.

Most of the major networks and broadcasters will have some form of event coverage. Plenty of highlights and clips will be available on social media platforms like Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram.

While the quality of these streams may vary, they can be a good option for those unable to access other forms of coverage.

If you want to get close and personal with the action, following the event on social media is the best way. As it happens, you’ll see all the highs and lows, the excitement and the drama.

So, if you’re in the UK and want to watch National Finals Rodeo, follow the event on social media. It’s the best way to experience all the action!

Conclusion

In conclusion, watching the National Finals Rodeo in the UK may seem challenging, but several options are available to make it possible.

ProRodeoTV and Cowboy Channel Plus provide access to the event without a VPN, while CBS Sports Network requires a VPN. It is important to plan and stay on the schedule to avoid missing any actions.

The National Finals Rodeo is an exciting event to watch, and using a reliable VPN service can help improve the quality of your viewing experience.

With the information in this guide, you should be well-equipped to enjoy the National Finals Rodeo from the comfort of your home in the UK.

So saddle up and get ready for some thrilling rodeo action.
